amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following new section: SEC. 10002. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to propose, plan for, or execute an additional Base Realignment and Closure round.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to propose, plan for, or execute an additional Base Realignment and Closure round.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A065) offered by Mr. Wittman.
